page.title: 01SUMMARY OF THE BLOCK
page.content: by Richard,Daniel,Simone This area is interesting historically with a Royal residence used as a home and of such beauty and size that it attracts millions of tourists to the area creating wealth and employment locally. The river Thames flowing through Windsor,Datchet and Old Windsor increases the beauty of the area, provides transport and creates local employment. The Royal Farms are intensively worked creating jobs for locals with housing included. The close proximity of London and the good road and rail links ensure that it will remain a popular and prosperous residential area with many bread-winners commuting daily to the city.The Great Park provides open countryside for leisure activities.
